sub_title: Social Media Content Creator & Strategist | Advertising Student | Co-Founder of New Girl In Town NL
summary:
I'm Rafaella, a young creative from Cyprus based in the Netherlands. 

Despite being accepted into the prestigious UCL (University College London) for a BA degree in Architecture, I ultimately followed my heart into my passion for the arts and marketing. I now study Advertising at the Willem de Kooning art academy, the only school in the Netherlands that teaches advertising as an applied art. 

With a 5 year background in digital content creation, I specialize in social media video platforms such as Instagram & Tiktok. My wide range of skills in design, marketing, branding, video editing, concept generation, visual communication, and social media strategy have helped me elevate over 80 small businesses online.

I‚Äôm a strategist, translating brand identities and unique selling points into authentic stories that bring both the business and the viewer value through online content. I can turn regular social media scrollers into clients as indeed I have used my knowledge to successfully build my own personal brand online, gaining over 8M views & 1.9M likes on tiktok in 2022. 

I am always open to exploring new ideas and taking on new projects as I seek progress and evolution in my work.
